1902965.book: Sayyidina Rasoolullah Performing Nawaafil At Home
1902965.reference:
Reference  : Shama'il Muhammadiyah 1902965
In-book reference  : Book 42, Hadith 001
English translation  : Vol. 1, Book 42, Hadith 001
1902965.text: Abdu’llah ibn Sa'd said: "I asked Allah’s Messenger (Allah bless him and give him peace) about performing the ritual prayer in my home, and performing it in the mosque." He said: “You may notice how near my home is to the mosque. I prefer praying at home over praying in the mosque, except in the case of a prescribed ritual prayer.”
